Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down."

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Korpo

texts.en:
Korpo is 37 years old. She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County, which is located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. 

Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Korpo and her fiancée stay together. She stopped her education in the 5th grade and has three children between18 and 10 years old. They are in school and  live at home. For the past five years she has been selling slippers in the local market in order to help her children. She started this business by selling for her mother, and she learned this business from her.,She likes her business because of the way people respond to it. She is  requesting a loan to purchase more slippers for her business and hopes to have more money to sustain her family.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers for her business.

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is 19 years old. She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County, located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish.  

Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Faith is single. She stopped her education in the 8th grade. For the past two year she been selling used clothes in the local market. She started this business by selling for her mother, and she learned this business from her. She likes her business because the way people respond to it. She is  requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business and hopes to have more money to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Ziad

texts.en: Ziad is a 23-year-old single guy who has two brothers and one sister. Ziad is a university student majoring in business administration. He is seeking another educational loan to pay for his semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his semester fees.

loans.name: Isata

texts.en:
Isata is 43 years old and married with four children, who are between 12 and 25 years old. She runs a clothing business in Port Loko in the northern area of Sierra Leone.

She's been in this business for three years and sells wax cotton and jeans.  She says that the main challenge to her business is the slow purchasing power during the rainy season.

Isata requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more wax cotton and jeans for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her support her children and take care of her family. In the future, she would like to open a big shop. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy more wax cotton and jeans for resale.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane is from Akhtala village in the Syuniq region. She has been involved in agriculture for many years and currently her farm includes chickens and pigs. Gayane's husband and elder son now are working abroad and are financially supporting their family. Gayane and her little son Narek (in the photo) are running a farm and work hard to gather a high income. Unfortunately, because of the hard economic times, it is very difficult for them to sustain their living, and the income from agriculture is hardly enough to cover daily costs.

Gayane has applied for this loan to purchase a pig and forage for feeding it. She plans to fatten it, and then, after some months, sell at a higher price.

The loan is very important for Gayane to be able to gather more income and for her husband and son to be able come back, stay with their family and work in their motherland.

loans.use: to purchase a pig and feed

loans.name: Mwalogo

texts.en:
Mwalogo is married with six school-going children. He owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Mwalogo has operated a business selling fish at the market for the past ten years. He sells to town dwellers and neighbors. He faces a major challenge of the high cost of purchasing fish, especially during cold currents in the deep sea.

Mwalogo is requesting a loan to purchase bundles of fish, cooking fat oil and firewood. He decided to join Yehu to access loans at a lower cost to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish, cooking fat oil and firewood

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is 26 years old, single, and not supporting anybody. He has been in his business for the last two years with a monthly income of 50,000 Kenyan shillings.

Andrew will be using this loan to purchase sheep and goats. With the anticipated profits from his expanded business, he will buy a vehicle. His hope and dream is to start a new business and to provide for his future family.

loans.use: To buy more goats for sale

loans.name: Mama

texts.en:
Mama is 25 years old. She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County located by the sea. It is well-known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Mama and her fiancée stay together. She stopped her education in 5th grade and has five children, ages 5 to 8 months old. Only one is in school, and they all live at home. 

For the past six years, she been selling charcoal in the local market in order to help her children. She started this business by selling for her mother, and she learned this business from her. She likes her business because of the way people respond to it. She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal for her business, and hopes to have more money to sustain her family.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Kumba

texts.en:
Kumba is 33 years old. She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County, located by the sea. It is well-known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Kumba and her fiancée stay together. She stopped her education in 5th grade, and has five children between 11 and 2 years old. Only three are in school, and they all live at home. 

For the past four years, she has been selling rubber dishes (bowls, cups, spoon, plates, etc.) in the local market in order to help her children. She started this business by selling for her mother, and she learned this business from her. She likes her business because of the way people respond to it. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more goods such as bowls, cups, spoons, plates, etc., for her business. She hopes to have more money to sustain her family.

loans.use: to purchase more goods such as bowls, cups, spoons, plates, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Armine

texts.en:
Armine has been involved in agriculture for many years. She is from Brnakot village of Syuniq region, which is famous for its cold and severe climate. Locals here are mostly involved in agriculture and some limited land cultivation. Armine lives with her husband and is involved in a farming business. Her farm currently includes two cows, 25 goats, pigs and chickens. She also cultivates barley and potato and owns a little orchard where she grows different types of trees, such as nut, apple and pear trees.

By requesting this loan, Armine wants to purchase four calves and cover fuel costs. This loan will solve her problems and she will be able to continue her farming business. Armine dreams of having a big and profitable farm and seeing her children and grandchildren living appropriate and ensured lives.

loans.use: to pay for four calves and cover fuel costs

loans.name: Sevaroy

texts.ru: Севарой молодая замужняя женщина. Ей 22 года и у нее маленький ребёнок. Она вместе с мужем и ребёнком живет в районе Дж.Руми. Ее муж занимается земледелием и работает в сельском хозяйстве уже несколько лет. Сама Севарой работает швеей у себя дома. Она хочет начать бизнес в сфере купли-продажи мелкорогатого скота. В ведении бизнеса ей будет помогать муж. И у них есть все условия для разведения скота. С этой целью Севарой обратилась в ХУМО. Она просит кредит для закупа двух голов овец и их корма. В дальнейшем за счет дохода с деятельности, Севарой планирует купить швейную машинку модели YAMATA.
texts.en: Sevaroy is a young married woman.  She is 22 years old and has a small child. She lives with her husband and child in J.Rumy. He husband is engaged in agriculture and has been working on a farm for several years. Sevaroy herself works as a seamstress in her home. She wants to start a business in the area of buying and selling livestock. Her husband will help her run the business. They have all the conditions necessary to raise livestock. With this goal, Sevaroy has come to HUMO. She has asked for a loan to purchase two heads of sheep and their feed. In the future, depending on her income and productivity, Sevaroy plans to purchase a Yamata brand sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase two heads of sheep and their feed

loans.name: Hafeez

texts.en: Hafeez is a 35-year-old widow who has been running a beauty parlor business for about 10 years. She offers many facilities to her customers such as makeup, hair styling, facials, skin polishing etc. Through providing her best services, she has become very famous in her community. In order to meet the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetics products for the parlor.  But because of having low cash on hand, she contacted Kashf Foundation to apply for her second loan of Rs 25,000 to buy hair care products and skin products with packs of makeup kits and hair rollers in large quantities. She is hopeful to cater to more customers time after time. She dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products and makeup kits in large quantities.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a motorcycle and vehicle mechanic in Oloitoktok town. He has been in this business for four years. He is 41 years old, married and has two children, aged 6 and 3 years old. 

This is his first loan term from KADET LTD, and he plans to buy a welding machine. He also plans to buy vehicle and motorcycle spare parts for use in his mechanic business. He will use the anticipated income to pay school fees for his children. 

He hopes to expand his business by opening a spare parts shop and, hence, make more income and be able to provide good education for his children.

loans.use: To buy a welding machine and spare parts.

loans.name: Mama

texts.en:
Mama, 40 years old, lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County, located by the sea and well-known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Mama, educated to the sixth grade, has six children between 22 and 6 years old, only three of whom are living at home and in school.

For the past three years Mama has been selling palm oil in the local market, a business she learned from her friends and began with a little money from her husband’s family. She is now requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for her business, hoping to earn more money to sustain her family.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is married and has five school going children. She owns a house that neither has electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She has operated a fish selling business at the market for the past fifteen years, selling to her town dwellers and neighbors’. She faces a major challenge of high cost of purchasing fish to earn a living and support her family.

She is requesting a loan to purchase bundles of fish, cooking fat oil and firewood for fish preparation. She decided to join Yehu to access loans at lower cost to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish, cooking fat oil and firewood for fish preparation

loans.name: Cholpongul

texts.ru:
Чолпонгул  45 лет, вдова, имеет 3 детей. Чолпонгул в качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и выращиванием сельхозкультур – фасоли, перца, картофеля, стартовав с покупки 1 нетели. Благодаря упорному труду Чолпонгул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 корова с приплодом, жеребец, 1,85 га арендованной земли. Продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит в месяц около 5,000 сом.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чолпонгул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки дойной коровы и удобрений для земли.  Доходы от кредита Чолпонгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Cholpongul is 45 years old, widowed, with 3 children. In order to provide an income for her family, Cholpongul raises livestock and grows crops - beans, peppers, potatoes, starting with the purchase of one cow.  Thanks to her stubborn labor, Cholpongul currently has one cow with offspring, a horse, and 1.85 hectares of leased land. The sale of milk and dairy products provides her with an income of about 5000 somons per month.  In order to further grow her business, Cholpongul has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum and Partners" to ask for a loan of 60,000 somons in order to increase the amount of livestock by purchasing a cash cow and fertilizer for the land.  Cholpongul plans to invest her earnings from the loan into acquiring additional livestock animals.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and fertilizer

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en: Amelia is 41 years old. She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County, located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu (cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce). Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. Amelia is married. She completed Grade 7 and has five children between 8 and 18 years old. All of them are living at home and attending school. For the past seven years, she has been operating a cook shop selling rice and soup in the local market. She started this business with a little money from her husband. She learned the business from her friends. She likes her business because of the ways people respond to it. She is requesting a loan to purchase more food ingredients, such as pepper, meat, fish, coal, Vita, etc., for her business. She hopes to have more money to sustain her family.

loans.use: to purchase more food ingredients, such as pepper, meat, fish, coal, Vita, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Chauke Group

texts.en: Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 27-year-old Trueman from Masvingo (his hand is raised). He is married and has three children.  Trueman runs a manufacturing business producing maputi. The business has been in operation for 10 years. He says the main challenge he faces is that of high transport costs of ferrying maize from Chipinge and Chivhu to Save. Trueman has requested a loan of $600 to buy maize and plastic packages. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him an increase in income to improve his family's welfare. In the future Trueman plans to buy a truck to reduce transport costs.

loans.use: to purchase maize and plastic packages

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is 48 years old, and lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County which is located by the sea. Grand Bassa County is well known for its beaches and delicious fish.  Many logging companies are also based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Anna is married, completed grade 7, and has seven children between 10 to 32 years old.  Only two are attending school, and live at home.  For the past 15 years she has been selling pepper, bitter ball, palm oil, vita etc.  She started this business with a little amount of money from her husband, and she learned this business from her mother.  She likes her business because of the ways customers respond to it, and she spends 8 hours with her business six day a week(s).  She is  requesting a loan to purchase more goods for her business and hopes to make money to sustain her family.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her business

loans.name: Arimae Community

texts.en:
Arimae is an 800-person Emberá and Wounaan indigenous community in Panama’s Darien province. The community has been working with Planting Empowerment for more than six years to manage their land more sustainably and profitably. They will use the $8,000 loan to buy plantain seed stock and pay for their planting, maintenance, and harvest. With the proceeds from the plantain harvests they will finance community development projects and support legal efforts to secure their reservation.

Liriano lives with his wife and daughter in Arimae, and is part of one of the founding families of the community. He has been working for Planting Empowerment since the company formed, and currently manages the day-to-day maintenance of 25 hectares of agroforestry projects. He is currently studying to receive his professional Forester's degree from the University of Panama in the Darien. Liriano expects to become Planting Empowerment’s Head Forester when he finishes school. 

The residents of Arimae are ancestors of the Chocó people who migrated from the Chocó region of Colombia during the 16th century, and subsisted for generations as hunter-gatherers and fishermen. Today, the community members depend mostly on subsistence agriculture and day labor to put food on the table. Arimae is part of a network of indigenous reservations that once stretched for hundreds of thousands of hectares in the Darien. Over the past 30 years however, their land holdings have declined sharply as illegal logger and cattle ranchers encroach into their reservation in search of timber and pastureland.

loans.use: to pay for plantain seed, fertilizer, tools, and technical assistance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase soap detergent mixtures and fresh fruits for making juice

loans.name: Sainah

texts.en:
Sainah is 39 years old.  She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County and is located by the sea. Grand Bassa County is well known for its beaches and delicious fish.  Many logging companies are also based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

She is married and she did not go to school.  She has three children between the ages of 15 to 19, two of which are currently in school and live at home.  For the past four years she has been selling bitter ball, pepper, oil, vita, salt in the local market.  She started this business with little money from her husband, and she learned this business from her mother.  She likes her business because of the ways customers buy from her, and she spends 10 hours with her business six day a weeks.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more litter ball, pepper, oil, vita, salt, etc., for her business and hopes to have more money to sustain her family.

loans.use: to purchase more litter ball, pepper, oil, vita, salt for her business

loans.name: Phat

texts.en: Phat would like to take a loan to buy a large quantity and variety of SIM cards and mobile cards to sell from her shop. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity and variety of SIM cards and mobile cards

loans.name: Quyen

texts.en:
Quyen would like to take a further loan to purchase coffee, sugar, milk, and furniture for her stall.

Quyen's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers, and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase coffee, sugar, milk, and furniture

loans.name: Waros Group

texts.en: Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 27-year-old Peter from Masvingo. He is single and has no children.  Peter runs a retail business selling cement. The business has been in operation for 10 years. He says the main challenge he is facing is that of high transport costs of ferrying cement from Bulawayo to Save. Peter has requested a loan of $600 to buy cement for resale. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to increase his income and hence improve his family's welfare. In the future Peter plans to buy more vehicles to use for transporting the cement.

loans.use: to purchase cement

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 42 years old.  She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County which is located by the sea and is well known for its beaches and delicious fish.  Many logging companies are also based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Elizabeth is married and completed the 12th grade, before establishing her business 16 years ago of selling cosmetics.  Presently she sells cool aid, juice, and water for two years now.  She started this business with a little amount of money from her husband who works as a Firestone security guard, and she learned this business from him.  She likes how people respond to her business, and the mostly she enjoys the interaction of her customers.  She spends 8 hours with her business six day a week(s). She is requesting a loan to purchase more cool aid, juice and water for her business and hopes to get more money and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more cool aid, juice and water for her business

loans.name: Kouassikiakro Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Kouassikiakro fait partie de la coopérative CPSL et est située à Meagui, une petite ville au sud-ouest de la Côte d’Ivoire dans la région du Bas Sassandra, proche de Soubré. Le groupe est composé de 8 personnes. 
Moussa a 48 ans et il est un membre du groupe Kouassikiakro. Il s‘occupe de 15 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 5 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative CPSL et il a 4 hectares de cacao en cours de double certification Rain Forest Alliance/UTZ, ce qui veut dire qu’il respecte les principes et les normes de l’agriculture durable. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais et des produits phytosanitaires pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut acheter un panneau solaire.
texts.en:
The group Kouassikiakro is part of the CPSL cooperative and is located in Meagui, a small town in southwestern Cote d'Ivoire, in Région de Bas Sassandra, near Soubré. The group is composed of eight persons. 

Moussa is 48 years old, and he is a member of the group Kouassikiakro. He takes care of fifteen persons at home. He has been part of the CPSL cooperative for five years, and he has four hectares of cocoa undergoing Rain Forest Alliance/UTZ double certification. 

Thanks to this loan, he is going to be able to purchase manure and pesticides for his plantation. These products will enable him to augment his production and thus increase his revenues. 

With the additional money, he wants to purchase a solar panel.

loans.use: to purchase manure and pesticide

loans.name: Badriddin

texts.ru: Бадриддин жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 34 лет. Он женат, но пока не имеет детей. Вместе с женой он живёт в маленьком доме в сельской деревне. Не имея детей, они всё же не унывают, а продолжают надеется и ждут. Чтобы иметь постоянный доход Бадридин занимается своим бизнесом. Уже более 3-х лет он вместе со своей женой выращивает картофель. Сам Бадридин родился в семье дехканина, и поэтому он имеет большой опыт в этом деле, так как с детства помогал своему отцу работать на поле. Каждый год, в сезонный период они получают хороший урожай, который потом продают на рынке и получают стабильный доход. Получаемый доход от своего бизнеса Бадриддин расходует на пропитание и нужды своей семьи. Но он хочет привести свой дом в благоприятное состояние и для этого ему нужны денежные средства. Также он мечтает стать большим дехканом и хочет расширить свой бизнес, увеличив объем урожая. Увеличив объём урожая, он будет получать больше прибыли и что поможет ему накопить денежные средства для ремонта своего дома. По этой причине Бадридин обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит, чтобы закупить семена картофеля. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Badriddin is a joyful 34-year-old man. He is married but does not yet have children. He and his wife live in a small house in a rural village. Not having had children yet, they have not lost heart, but continue to hope and wait. In order to have a steady income, Badriddin engages in his business. For more than 3 years, he and his wife have been growing potatoes. Badriddin himself was born into a farming family, and, because of this, he has great experience in this business, since he has been helping his father work the field from childhood. Each year during the season, he receives a good harvest, which he then sells at the market and receives a stable income.  Badriddin uses the income from his business to spend on food and necessities for his family. However, he wants to bring his home to a better condition, and he needs money in order to do this. So, he has been dreaming of becoming a bigger-scale farmer and wants to expand his business and increase the size of his harvest. Increasing the size of his harvest will give him a larger profit, which will help him save up enough money to remodel his home.  For this reason, Badriddin turned to Avrand and hopes to receive a loan in order to buy potato seeds.  He hopes to have a positive outcome and thanks Avrand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Abdunazar

texts.ru: Абдуназар женат и является отцом троих детей. Ему 46 лет. Он проживает со своей семьей в районе Дж.Руми. Его жена и дочь являются пайщиками дехканского хозяйства. Сам Абдуназар занимается земледелием. Он спокойный и трудолюбивый человек. Абдуназар хочет улучшить финансовое положение в семье. Он намерен расшириться и одновременно работать в двух сферах деятельности; земледелием и животноводством. У Абдуназара есть сарай для содержания скота. Он планирует каждый месяц закупать по двух голов мелкорогатого скота и после откорма продавать на местном рынке. Абдуназар запрашивает кредит для приобретения двух голов овец и их корма. Он надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Abdunazar is married and is the father to three children. He is 46 years old. He lives with his family in the J. Rumy region. His wife and daughter are shareholders in a farm. Abdunazar himself engages in agriculture. He is a calm and hardworking person. Abdunazar hopes to improve the financial well-being of his family. He hopes to expand and simultaneously work in two areas of productivity: agriculture and raising livestock.  Abdunazar has a shed to hold livestock. He plans to purchase two heads of small livestock each month, then feed them and sell them at the local market. Abdunazar has asked for a loan in order to obtain two heads of sheep and their feed.  He is hoping to receive your support.

loans.use: To purchase and sell livestock

loans.name: Khai

texts.en:
Khai is requesting a new loan to buy a variety of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy many kinds of goods, such as soft drinks and confectioneries

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael has a barber shop in Kangundo town. He has been in the business for nine years. He is 40 years old and married with four children.

This will be Michael's fourth loan term with KADET Ltd., and he plans to use the money to buy more shaving equipment for use in his business. This will include shaving machines, towels, a wall mirror, oil and more hair brushes. He will use the generated income to pay for the education of his children. He hopes to expand his business by employing more people to help him in his barber shop and, thereby, serve more customers. He will be able to make more income and provide for the needs of his family.

loans.use: To buy more shaving machines.

loans.name: Nhung

texts.en: Nhung is requesting a new loan to buy a range of vegetables to wholesale for her retailing customers. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a large variety of vegetables, such as spinach, garlic, cabbage, and carrots.

loans.name: Dung

texts.en: Dung would like to take a further loan to buy more water pipes and other materials. His previous loan enabled him to increase his sales and earn a higher income to support his family. He hopes that another loan will assist him in increasing the size of his business, attract new customers and increase sales. He also hopes that through the loan he can increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy water pipes and other materials for making water systems.

loans.name: Hang

texts.en:
Hang is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. 
She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy many kinds of goods, such as food and beverages, to stock in her store.

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Minh, 42 years old, is married and has two daughters. She and her husband support the family through the income they earn from selling pork and noodles. They begun this business twelve years ago. They live in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Minh intends to take a loan to buy pork and noodles and repair her house. The additional capital will enable her to increase her sales. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy pork, noddles and repair her house.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Loan is 59 years old, married and has two children. Her husband is retired. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. She has run a general store for ten years. She sells sugar, toys for kids, soft drinks, yogurt and other household items to people in her community. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products, in particular food and beverages, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy food and beverages to stock her store.

loans.name: Tao

texts.en:
Tao, 52, is married and has two children. He lives with his family in Ho Chi Minh City. His wife is running a beauty salon. He supports his family by running a business of audio equipment for hire.

Tao started this business eight years ago. He is requesting a loan to expand his business by buying additional different audio equipment to better satisfy his customers.

He hopes his business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist him in improving his family's living conditions and sending his children to school.

loans.use: to buy audio equipment to better satisfy his customers

loans.name: Carrefour 1 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Carrefour 1 fait partie de la coopérative CPSL et est situé à Meagui, une petite ville au sud-ouest de la Côte d’Ivoire dans la région du Bas Sassandra, proche de Soubré. Le groupe est composé de 6 personnes. 
Ouseni a 29 ans et il est un membre du groupe Carrefour 1. Cela fait 4 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative CPSL et il a 3.5 hectares de cacao en cours de double certification Rain Forest Alliance/UTZ, ce qui veut dire qu’il respecte les principes et les normes de l’agriculture durable. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais et des produits phytosanitaires pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut construire une maison pour sa famille.
texts.en:
The Carrefour 1 group belongs to the CPSL [agricultural] cooperative and is based in MEagui, a small town in the southwest of Côte d'Ivoire in the Bas Sassandra Region, close to Soubré. The group is composed of six people.

Ouseni is 29 years old and a member of the Carrefour 1. He joined the CPSL cooperative four years ago. He has a land plot of 3.5 ha [about 9 acres] used for growing cocoa; he is in the  process of obtaining double certification by the Rain Forest Alliance/UTZ, which means that he follows the guidelines and norms of sustainable agriculture. Thanks to this loan, he will be able to buy fertilizers and phytosanitary [plant health] products for his field. These products will allow him to increase his produce and thus his revenues. He would like to use these additional funds to build a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and plant health products.

loans.name: Boribina 2 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Boribina 2 fait partie de la coopérative CPSL et est située à Meagui, une petite ville au sud-ouest de la Côte d’Ivoire dans la région du Bas Sassandra, proche de Soubré. Le groupe est composé de 7 personnes. 
Ousmane a 33 ans et il est un membre du groupe Boribina 2. Il s‘occupe de 5 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 5 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative CPSL et il a 7 hectares de cacao en cours de double certification Rain Forest Alliance/UTZ, ce qui veut dire qu’il respecte les principes et les normes de l’agriculture durable. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais et des produits phytosanitaires pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut acheter des tôles pour couvrir sa maison.
texts.en:
The group "Boribina 2" is part of the CPSL cooperative and is located in Meagui, a small town in southwestern Cote d'Ivoire, in Région de Bas Sassandra, near Soubré. The group is composed of seven persons. 

Ousmane is 33 years old, and he is a member of the group "Boribina 2". He takes care of five persons at home. He has been part of the CPSL cooperative for five years, and he has seven hectares of cocoa undergoing Rain Forest Alliance/UTZ double certification, which means he respects the principles and standards of sustainable agriculture.

Thanks to this loan, he is going to be able to purchase fertilizer and pesticides for his plantation. These products will enable him to augment his production and thus increase his revenues. 

With the additional money, he wants to purchase sheet metal to roof his house.

loans.use: to purchase manure and pesticides

loans.name: Afiwa

texts.fr: Afiwa est une femme âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mariée à un chauffeur. Elle a 3 enfants, dont 2 à l’école. Le premier a 10 ans et le dernier a 3 ans. Afiwa travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2007. Elle revend du charbon de bois, du maïs et des tubercules d’igname pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock. Afiwa a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter du charbon de bois, du maïs et des tubercules d’igname. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. Dans les prochaines années, Afiwa voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Afiwa is a 36-year-old woman who is married to a chauffeur. She has three children, of whom two are in school. The first child is 10 years old, and the last is 3. Afiwa has been working as a retailer since 2007. She sells charcoal, corn, and yam tubers out of her home to any customer. She purchases the goods in Lomé. At the moment, her main difficulty is an inventory shortage. 

Afiwa has requested a second WAGES loan to purchase some charcoal, corn, and yams. She wants to reinvest in the business. In the coming years, Afiwa would like to expand her business. She says that, with the profits, she plans on improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal, corn, and yams to sell

loans.name: Ermogenes

texts.es: Ermógenes, de 46 años, está casado y tiene 03 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Ermógenes consiste en el transporte de pasajeros en su mototaxi, el se levanta muy temprano para alistarse y salir a las diversas calles de la ciudad en busca de los eventuales pasajeros quienes requieren transportarse de un lugar a otro. Gracias a los 12 años que lleva realizando este trabajo ha aprendido a conocer a sus clientes y se ha ganado la confianza de muchos de ellos lo cual le permite ser solicitado para brindar servicios particulares siendo contratado por largas horas de trabajo. Su carisma y alegría son su principal arma para sobrellevar el día a día laboral y relacionarse mejor con sus pasajeros. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que el puede disponer de su tiempo ya que trabaja principalmente en horarios de mayor demanda del público, le está yendo bien ya que como su mototaxi es propio no tiene que pagar a alguien por el alquiler, tiene como planes a futuro poder comprar dos mototaxis más para así ampliar su flota vehicular y poder alquilarlos. Este es su tercer préstamo con Kiva, por lo tanto agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible esta financiamiento razón por la cual se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de S/.1500 soles, comprará algunas piezas y enviará su mototaxi al taller para que le hagan algunas reparaciones.
texts.en:
Ermógenes, age 46, is married and has three children with whom he lives in his own house.  His work is transporting passengers in his ‘mototaxi’ [three wheeled motorized vehicle].  He gets up very early in order to get ready and to out to different streets in the city looking for possible passengers who need transportation from one place to another. 

Thanks to the 12 years that he has been doing this work, he has learned to know his customers, and he has gained the confidence of many of them.  This allows him to have his private services requested as he is hired for long working hours.  His charisma and joyfulness are his main tools for carrying out his day to day work and for relating better with his passengers.

What he likes about his business activity is that he is able to arrange his time because he mainly works during the times when there is the most public demand.  It is going well for him because his mototaxi is his own, and he does not need to pay anyone to rent it.

His plan for the future is to buy two more mototaxis in order to increase his fleet of vehicles and to be able to rent them.

This is his third loan with Kiva.  He is grateful to all of the people who make this loan possible.  Therefore, he pledges to make his payments in a punctual manner.  He will use the requested 1,500 soles to buy some parts and to send his mototaxi to the shop for some repairs to be made.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts and to perform vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Tam

texts.en:
Tam, 33, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a worker. She earns an income running a store selling soft drinks. 

She started this business ten years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of beverages, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of beverages, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Kaybee Group

texts.en: Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 41 year old Bigi from Masvingo (his hand is raised). He is married and has four children; three of them are attending school.  Bigi runs a retail business which sells groceries,clothes and electrical gadgets. The business has been in operation for 4 years. He says the main challenge he faces is that of high prices from the wholesalers. Bigi has requested a loan of $600 to buy groceries, clothes and electrical gadgets for resale. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him an increase his income hence, improve his family's welfare. In the future Bigi plans to build a shop in Save.

loans.use: to buy groceries, clothes and electricals

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is 45 years old.  She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County and is located by the sea and is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

She is a widow.  She did not go to school, but she established her business of selling fish in the local market four years ago, which she is good at managing.  She started this business with a little money from her mother, and she learned this business from her.  She likes how people respond to her business, and the mostly she enjoys the interaction of her customers.  She spends 9 hours a day in her business six day a week.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish for her business.  She hopes to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es:
Máximo, vive con su compañera de vida, sus cuatro hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 6, 9, 9 y 14 años, todos dependen de él. Máximo, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos y a la ganadería, el oficio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia y lo realiza de 6:000am a 6:00pm con su esposa y sus hijos.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar concentrado para el ganado y los insumos agrícolas necesarios para el cultivo tales como: abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas; este le servirá a superarse como familia y que sus hijos aprendan dicha actividad.
Su sueño es brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Máximo lives with his life partner and their four children ages 6, 9, 9, and 14, all of whom depend on him. Máximo works by cultivating basic grains and raising livestock, a skill he learned on his own. He works from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM with his wife and children. 

The loan he is requesting will allow him to buy food for the cattle and necessary agricultural supplies for cultivation such as fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides, and other pest controllers. This will help his family succeed and help his children learn this skill. His dream is to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides, and other pest controllers.

loans.name: Kasagama Central Market  Bashubuzi Twimukye Group

texts.en:
Peace a 40 year-old married woman who has been with Ugafode for the last two years as an individual but has chosen to form a group after seeing the need in her community. She mobilized the group to come and acquire a loan from Ugafode because she had previously enjoyed good service. She is borrowing  UGX 800,000 in order to buy stock for her grocery and banana business so that she can increase her sales. Her clients come from the neighbouring community and business people.

She hopes to grow her business through the partnership with Kiva. The group is pledging to strengthen the partnership through good repayments.

loans.use: To buy grocery stock and bananas to sell

loans.name: Madeleine

texts.fr:
Madeleine fait partie de la coopérative CPSL qui est située à Meagui, une petite ville au sud-ouest de la Côte d’Ivoire dans la région du Bas Sassandra, proche de Soubré. 
Elle a 36 ans et s‘occupe de 15 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 5 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative CPSL et elle a 10 hectares de cacao. 

Grace au crédit, elle va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais et des produits phytosanitaires pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, elle veut pouvoir terminer la construction de sa maison.
texts.en:
Madeleine is part of the CPSL cooperative, which is located in Meagui, a small town in southwestern Cote d'Ivoire, in Région de Bas Sassandra, near Soubré.  

She is 36 years old and takes care of fifteen persons at home. She has been part of the CPSL cooperative for five years, and she has ten hectares of cocoa. 

Thanks to this loan, she is going to be able to purchase fertilizer and pesticides for her plantation. These products will enable her to augment production and thus increase her revenues. 

With the additional money, she wants to finish building her house.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pesticides for her cocoa plantation

loans.name: Barno

texts.ru: Барно повторно обращается за кредитом. Свой предыдущий кредит Барно брала для покупки купальников и женского нижнего белья для увеличения товарооборота. К сожалению, осенью прошлого года произошел пожар, на рынке где она торговала и весь ее товар сгорел. Барно пережила очень трудные положения в своем бизнесе, однако она не отчаялась. Она целеустремленная женщина и движется всегда вперед. Барно намерена заново начать свою предпринимательскую деятельность, так как он приносил ей хороший доход. Поэтому она обращается за кредитом для закупа товара. Она снова будет торговать женским нижним бельем. И она ждет Вашей поддержки.
texts.en: Barno has again asked for a loan. She took out her previous loan in order to purchase swimsuits and women's underwear to increase turnover.  Unfortunately, in the fall of last year, there was a fire on the market where she was a vendor and all of her goods were burned. Barno has survived very difficult circumstances in her business, but she has not despaired. She is a motivated woman and is always moving forward.  Barno has decided to once again resume her business, as it was providing her with a good income. Because of this, she has asked for a loan for the purchase of merchandise. She will again be selling women's underwear. And she awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase women's underwear in order to restart her business

loans.name: Julienne

texts.fr: Revendeuse d’ustensiles de cuisine et de pagnes à domicile, Julienne a un enfant âgé de 29ans qui ne va plus à l’école. Elle est âgée de 46ans. Elle fait son second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des ustensiles de cuisine et des pagnes afin de revendre aux clients et tirer de bénéfice. Ses achats se font au Grand marché et au Port autonome de Lomé. Avec les profits qu’elle va tirer de ses ventes, elle veut construire une boutique devant sa maison et prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en: A retailer of kitchen utensils and 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa), Julienne has a 29-year-old child who is no longer in school. Julienne is 46 years old. She is taking out her second WAGES loan to purchase some kitchen utensils and 'pagne' cloth to resell to customers and to make a profit. Her purchases are made at the Grand Marché at and the Autonomous Port of Lomé. With the profits she will make from her sales, she wants to build a store in front of her house and take care of her family.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen utensils and 'pagne' cloth to sell

loans.name: Ubumwe Group

texts.fr: La cliente  Muliri est secrétaire du groupe de crédit « Ubumwe », jeune entrepreneur courageuse, âgée de 35 ans et mère de 8 enfants. Son conjoint est un commerçant de divers. La cliente est vendeuse de Fanta (boissons sucrées). Elle commença cette activité avec le fonds reçu de son mari. Ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d’acheter 8 15 casiers de Fanta. Les casses de bouteilles sont des obstacles majeurs pour le développement de son activité. Dans le futur, elle souhaite agrandir son entreprise, construire une maison et scolariser ses enfants. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien en micro crédit aux femmes entrepreneurs.
texts.en:
This client, Muliri, is the secretary of the loan group "Ubumwe". A young and courageous entrepreneur, she is 35 years old and a mother of eight. Her husband is a merchant of various goods. This client sells Fanta (soft drinks). She started this business with funds from her husband. 

This new loan is going to be used to purchase 8 to 15 cases of Fanta. A major obstacle in developing her business is broken bottles. For the future, she would like to expand her enterprise, build a house, and provide education for her children. So, she thanks Hekima for its micro-credit support of women entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to purchase cases of Fanta to sell

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Mmassa Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 38 year-old Robert from Masvingo. He is married with four children, three of whom are attending school. 

Robert providing services as a photographer. The business has been in operation for 15 years. He says the main challenge he faces is that of stiff competition from other photographers. Robert has requested a loan of $600 to buy an additional camera and cartridges. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to improve his family's welfare. In the future Robert plans to complete the shop he is building at a local business centre.

loans.use: to buy an additional camera and cartridges

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is 32 years old.  She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County which is located by the sea and is well known for its beaches and delicious fish.  Many logging companies are also based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.

Caroline is unmarried.  She completed the 10th grade, and has two children aged 4 and 8, which are in school, and  live at home.  For the past ten years she has been making and selling local soap. She started this business with a little amount of money from her fiancee, and she learned this business from her mother.  She likes her business because of the ways people buy from her.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more caustic, oil, etc., for her business. She hopes to build a house, and buy her car.

loans.use: to purchase more caustic, oil, etc., for her business

loans.name: Thu

texts.en: Thu is 48 years old, married and has two sons. Her husband is a turner. They live in Ho Chi Minh City. She has been running a cafe and a general store in front of her door for ten years. She sells sugar, toys for kids, soft drinks, yogurt and other household items to people in her community. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products, in particular foods and beverages, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers. She started this business to cover her expenses, and raise her children. She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest to her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy foods and beverages to stock her store

loans.name: Nhung

texts.en:
Nhung is a 31-year-old married woman. She lives with two children and her husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a driver for hire. For five years, she has run a shop selling soft drinks for people in her community.

Nhung would like a loan to purchase a variety of soft drinks to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of soft drinks

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is 49 years old and is single. She lives in Ho Chi Minh City.

She has run an internet shop for two years. She intends to use her loan to buy many computers and game cards to meet the demands of her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions and save money for her emergencies.

loans.use: to buy computers and game cards

loans.name: Maudy

texts.es:
Maudy, de 32 años de edad, es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Esta casada con Augusto quien es empleado y padre de sus 02 hijos de 3 y 2 años de edad respectivamente, juntos  están cómodamente instalados en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Maudy es la venta de comidas regionales por está razón instalará una mesa en el frontis de su casa donde y atiende muy amablemente a todos sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos y transeúntes de la zona. Está retomando éste negocio pues lo había dejado por problemas personales y ahora está consiguiendo los implementos necesarios como platos, ollas y otros. Y piensa realizarlo sola.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable ya que tiene mucha demanda en su zona porque es muy conocida y solicitada, siendo sus vecinas quienes le piden que retome su negocio. Por otro lado, ella comenta que tiene problemas económicos pues con los ingresos de su esposo no les alcanza para cubrir todos sus gastos, por tanto quiere apoyarlo generándose un ingreso adicional. Este será su tercer préstamo con Kiva y está muy agradecia por el apoyo financiero recibido ya que le permite seguir adelante con su iniciativa de retomar su negocio.
Con el monto solicitado de 1200 nuevos soles comprará utensilios para su negocio como ollas, vasos y platos, además de mesas y sillas , los cuales son necesarios para su puesto de venta.
texts.en:
Maudy, 32 years old, is a woman with a great desire to move forward and provide her family with a better quality of life. She is married to Augusto, who has a job and is the father of their 2 children ages 3 and 2. Together, they live comfortably in their own home. Maudy sells regional food dishes, which is why she will set up a stall in front of her house where she happily attends to her customers. These are primarily neighbors and passers-by of the area. She is restarting this business since she previously had to leave it due to personal problems. Now she is getting the necessary items such as plates, pots, and other products. She plans to run it on her own.

She believes her business is fairly successful because there is a high demand in the area because she is well-known and popular. Her neighbors were the ones who asked her to reopen the business. On the other hand, she mentions that she has financial problems because her husband's income is not enough to cover all their expenses. Therefore, she wants to help him earn additional income. This will be her third Kiva loan and she is very grateful for the financial support she receives. This allows her to move forward in her initiative to reopen her business.

With the requested amount of 1200 nuevo soles, she will buy items such as pots, glasses, and plates in addition to tables and chairs, which are necessary for her food stall.

loans.use: to buy items such as pots, glasses, plates, and tables with chairs.

loans.name: Nhi

texts.en:
Nhi, 35, is married and has three children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns an income as a bricklayer. 

Nhi started a food stall to sell pork and bread 1 year ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of bread and pork to sell at her stall and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: T o buy a greater variety of bread and pork to sell

loans.name: Tu

texts.en:
Tu is 37 years old and is married with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns income as a driver for hire. Tu runs a food stall sellng sticky rice and beverages to earn a living. 

She started her business ten years ago. She intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying furniture, glasses and appliances for her food stall.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy furniture, glasses and appliances for her food stall.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Mónica, de 35 años de edad , está casada y tiene 03 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Mónica, consiste en al venta de productos dulces, específicamente de golosinas, su puesto está ubicado en su hogar y es muy concurrido por sus clientes, ya que esta muy bien situada y ella es muy conocida por su buen humor y carisma, lo cual ha hecho que sus ventas le den los ingresos que necesita. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y hacerlos reír, lleva 03 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que vender bajo los fuertes rayos del sol, por está razón le encantaría tener una tienda de golosinas donde pueda vender con más comodidad y ofrecer otro tipo de productos a sus clientes. Este será su quinto crédito con Kiva razón por la cual se encuentra muy agradecida ya que este apoyo financiero es necesario para seguir con su actividad laboral. Con el monto solicitado de S/.800 soles, comprará más golosinas tales como galletas, caramelos, chicles, entre otros.
texts.en:
Monica is 35, married, and has three children. They live in their own home. Monica’s work consists of selling sweets, specifically candy, from her shop that is located in her home. She is very busy with her customers since she has a good location and is well known for her good sense of humor and charisma. All of which means that her sales give her the income that she needs. 

What she likes best about her work is talking to customers and making them laugh. She has been doing this job for 3 years. She says the most difficult part is having to work under the strong rays of the sun, which is why she would love to have a candy store where she can sell her goods more comfortably and offer other kinds of products to her customers. 

This will be her fifth loan with Kiva. She is grateful because this financial support is necessary to continue with her work. With the requested amount of 800 Peruvian Nuevos Soles, she will purchase more sweets such as cookies, candies, and gum.

loans.use: purchase sweets such as cookies, candies, gum, and more

loans.name: Line Ursula

texts.fr: Line Ursula est une jeune femme celibataire agée de 35 ans. Elles a un enfant non scolarisé et deux neveux à sa charge. Ambitieuse, elle pratique la vente des fruits et légumes depuis 14 ans. Dans l'intention d'accroître son activité,elle a besoin d'un financement pour accroitre son activité. Une manière d'augmenter par ricochet son revenu. Ceci lui permettra non seulement de reinvestir son bénéfice dans son commerce mais aussi d'épargner.
texts.en: Line Ursula is a young woman, 25 years old, and unmarried. She has a child, not in school, and two nephews to support. An ambitious person, she has been selling fruit & vegetables for fourteen years. With the intention of increasing her business, she has need of financing, so as to increase her income as a result. This will enable her not only to reinvest profits into her business but also to save money.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of fruit & vegetables to sell

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres Unidas” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Cada una de ellas tiene sus actividades diferentes, pero se ayudan para poder mejorar sus vidas y las de su familia. Quieren capacitarse e ir creciendo.
La Sra. Ceferina, es parte de este grupo, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras,  tiene un carrito y todos los días bien temprano sale a recorrer por la ciudad.  Cuenta que esta conforme con su trabajo ya que es muy honesto y con esto da a su familia lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de verduras y frutas para la venta., ya que de esa forma podrá estar bien abastecida y surtida para seguir ofreciendo variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The  “Mujeres Unidas” was formed by several women who were neighbors in the city of Santaní. Each of them has a different activity, but they help each other to be able to improve their and their family's lives. They want to learn and grow.

Ceferina is part of this group. She sells fruits and vegetables. She has a cart and every day goes out very early to go through the city. She says that she is content with her work since it is honest and with it she gives her family what they need. She is asking for this loan to buy fruits and vegetables to sell, since this way she will be well stocked and supplied to keep offering a variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: 3 De Noviembre  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal 3 de Noviembre está conformada por 10 mujeres quienes viven por los alrededores de la parroquia de Cumbe en Cuenca, esta parroquia es de clima frió, esta rodea de mucha vegetación y verdes campos, su arquitectura es una mezcla de lo colonial y lo moderno. Su gente trabaja en especial en tareas del campo como la crianza de animales y la agricultura, también trabajan en la ciudad en diferentes actividades económicas. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Rosario, forma parte del banco comunal 3 de Noviembre desde hace 13 años, en todo este tiempo ha logrado establecer una mejor amistad con sus amigas de la comunidad y ser más solidarias, los créditos le han ayudado para continuar con su negocio.

Doña Rosario tiene 57 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos que son mayores de edad, están casados y viven independientes. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es propia.

Ella se dedica a las tareas del campo actividad aprendió de sus padres, cría y vende gallinas, cuyes y ovejas que las vende en su comunidad, tiene ganado del cual vende la leche. También se dedica a la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar. 

El dinero de su crédito va a invertir para la compra de abono para sus potreros y  alimento para sus animales. 

Su meta es tener más ganado y de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
The "3 de Noviembre" communal bank is comprised of 10 women who live in the surrounding area of the Cumbe parish in Cuenca. This area has a cold climate and is surrounded by a variety of vegetation and green fields. Its architecture is a mixture of colonial and modern. Many of the people work the land by raising animals and completing agricultural work. They also work in the city in a variety of jobs.

One of the members of this group is Rosario, who has been a member for 13 years. During this time, she has been able to establish a better friendship with her friends in the community and become more supportive. The loans have helped her to stay in business.

At 57 years old, Rosario is married and has three adult children who are married and live on their own. Her husband works in construction as a bricklayer. They live in their own home.

Rosario works in the fields, which she learned from her parents. She raises and sells chickens, guinea pigs, and sheep. She then sells them in the community. She also has cattle, which she uses to sell milk. She also works in agriculture. The crops she harvests are used for household consumption. 

She will invest the money from this loan into buying animal feed and fertilizer for her pastures. Her goal is to have more cattle of a better quality.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and animal feed.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es: Laura de 26 años de edad, es la propietaria de un taller de confecciones, negocio que decidió emprender hace dos años, después de empezar a estudiar la carrera de diseño de modas y alta costura. Su madre fue quien la impulsó y le facilitó el local en el cual ejerce su actividad. En sus instalaciones funciona no solo el taller donde fabrica la ropa, que ella misma diseña, sino también un almacén donde la exhibe. Ella aplica el plan separe, que consiste en pagar antes de llevar el producto a casa y esto gusta mucho a su clientela. También vende de contado y compra en grandes superficies de proveedores de telas e insumos,  que le ofrecen los mejores precios, así ella puede ajustar sus costos a las necesidades de su clientela. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que  hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará una máquina de confeccionar,  industrial, con el fin de mejorar los tiempos productivos y aumentar la calidad de sus productos. Su meta mas adelante es tener su propia marca y consolidarse con las mejores colecciones, diseñadas por ella misma, mientras su mayor desafío es lograr aumentar sustancialmente las ventas, aumentando su productividad para obtener ahorros y lograr su mayor sueño, que es tener su propio apartamento.
texts.en:
Laura is 26 years old and owns a clothing store.  She decided to open the store two years ago after starting to studying fashion design and couture.  Her mother was the one who prompted her to open the store and helped her get the premises where it operates.  The space does not only function as the workshop where she makes the clothing that she designs, but also as a store where it is exhibited.  She applies the separation plan, which is to pay before taking the product home, which her customers like very much, and she also accepts cash.  She purchases from fabric and accessories vendors over a large area since they offer the best prices.  This is how she can adjust her costs to the needs of her customers.  

Currently she is requesting her first loan from Kiva with the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo so that she can purchase an industrial sewing machine.  This will improve her production times and increase the quality of her products.  Her goal in the future is to have her own brand and consolidate with the best collections, designed by her.  Meanwhile, her greatest challenge is to succeed in substantially increasing sales and increase her production to have savings.  She wants to achieve her main goal, which is to have her own apartment.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Jose Mario

texts.es:
José, requiere de un nuevo préstamo porque necesita invertir en el negocio de la pesca, asimismo por la buena atención que el personal de la Institución brinda; este le permitirá comprar hilo de manila para reparar la red.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a incrementar sus ingresos y los utiliza en el consumo básico del hogar, asimismo en compra de medicina para su bebe; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
José needs a new loan because he needs to invest in his fishing business as well as for the good care he receives from the staff at the Institution. This loan will enable him to buy thread to repair his net. 
The previous loan helped him to increase his profits  which he used for basic household needs as well as to buy medicine for his baby. His family's economic condition and circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy thread to repair his net.

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh is 43 years old and is married with two daughters. Her husband is a security guard. Anh has been running a general store in front of her door for 12 years. She started this business to cover her expenses and to generate income to raise her children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Anh is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more household items and many kinds of soft drinks to stock her stall. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers and that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy more household items and many kinds of soft drinks to stock her stall.

loans.name: Hue

texts.en:
Hue would like to take a further loan to buy more rice and food ingredients to make food to sell from her stall. 

Hue's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy more rice and food ingredients

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Activas del ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde cada una está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza que les permite conocer la situación de cada una, donde 9  se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy escasos, y por esa misma razón es que esas mujeres están esforzándose el doble por mejorar.
Una de estas mujeres es la Sra. Maria, quien es modista, se dedica a esto hace un buen tiempo, y está haciéndose de muy buena clientela, ya que los trabajos que hace son de muy buena calidad siempre, y eso gusta a sus clientes. Quiere seguir creciendo y ayudar así a su familia.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, gomas y demás, para poder seguir con sus trabajos y cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Agradece por esta oportunidad de crecimiento que ella y su familia están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Activas (Active Women) group are in cycle 2 of the program of the women's committee. Each one is doing a survey to eliminate poverty, which allows them to understand the situation of each woman, of whom 9 are below the poverty line, which is to say, very low income. For this reason, these women are working twice as hard to improve.

One of these woman is Maria, who is a tailor. She has earned her living doing this for a while, and is creating very good customers for herself. Her work is always of good quality, and her customers like this. She wants to continue growing and thus help her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy fabric, thread, rubber and more, to be able to continue with her work and meet customer orders. She is grateful for this growth opportunity that she and her family are receiving.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, rubber and more.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Hoa is requesting another loan to expand her business by buying more different beverages to stock and to better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and in sending her children to school.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of beverages to sell from her store

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es: Zoila, de 52 años de edad , está casada y tiene 4 hijos, juntos viven en su casa propia.Zoila se dedica a la venta de comida y se encarga de la preparación de sabrosos potajes regionales, la clientela es atraída a su puesto de ventas por el inigualable aroma y el agradable sabor casero de sus comidas, vende en la vereda de su casa , la cual está ubicada en un sector muy concurrido por todo tipo de público.Disfruta mucho del trabajo que ha venido realizando, mas aún adora ver que sus clientes satisfechos , además le agrada conversar con cada uno de ellos mientras disfrutan de sus platillos, este trabajo le ha permitido ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y de la misma forma puede brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.Este es su octavo crédito con kiva, por tanto agradece la oportunidad y confianza que ponen en ella para recibir éste crédito, asimismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual.Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprará ingredientes y algunos insumos que necesita para continuar con la preparación de sus platos tales como arroz , carnes , verduras, entre otros.
texts.en:
Zoila, age 52, is married and has four children.  They live together in their own house.  Zoila sells food, and she prepares delicious regional stews.  The clientele is attracted to her sales stand for the incomparable aroma and the good home-made flavor.  

She sells on the sidewalk to her house.  It is located in an area that is very popular with all types of people.  She really enjoys the work that she has been doing.  Even more, she loves seeing her customers satisfied.  Also, it pleases her to chat with each one of them while they enjoy her dishes.  This work has allowed her to help her husband with the household expenses.  She is also able to provide her children with a better quality of life.

This is her eighth loan with Kiva.  She is grateful for the opportunity and the trust that is placed in her in order to receive this loan.  She pledges to make her payments in a punctual manner.  She will use the requested 3,000 soles to buy ingredients and some supplies she needs in order to continue preparing her dishes.  She will buy things like rice, meat, and vegetables, among others.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like rice, meat, and vegetables, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials

loans.name: Pascal

texts.fr:
Le partenariat entre l’entreprise sociale Nafa Naana et le boutiquier Pascal lui permet d’acheter des produits énergie commercialisés par Nafa Naana. L’objectif pour lui est de revendre les produits composés de 10 foyers améliorés, 5 foyers à gaz et 14 lampes solaires dans le but de d’augmenter ses revenus et améliorer son commerce. 
Avec sa boutique de vente au détail situé dans le quartier périphérique de Ouagadougou, Mogdin, Pascal a besoin d’une somme de 348 750 FCFA pour acquérir les produits solaires. Grâce à un prêt de ce montant, il pourra alors élargir sa gamme de produits en vue de satisfaire les besoins de ses clients aussi. L’activité de revente des produits est très importante car il voudrait contribuer à défendre la cause sociale des plus démunies en leur permettant de réaliser des économies. Les lampes serviront donc à éclairer les concessions de son quartier non électrifié et les foyers réduiront la consommation en énergie des ménages. En plus, la protection de l’environnement est son cheval de batail. 

Avec une famille composée d’une femme et de trois enfants dont il a la charge, Pascal envisage d’utiliser les revenus supplémentaires pour améliorer son activité et ne plus avoir recours aux prêts dans le futur pour étendre la gamme de produits de sa boutique
texts.en:
The partnership between the social enterprise Nafa Naana and a shopkeeper, Pascal, enables him to purchase energy products marketed by Nafa Naana. His objective is to resell the products, including 10 improved stoves, 5 gas stoves, and 14 solar lamps with the goal of increasing his income and improving his commerce. 

With this retail store located in an outlying district of Ouagadougou, Mogdin, Pascal needs the amount of 348,750 francs CFA to acquire solar products. Thanks to this loan amount, he will be able to expand his range of products with the aim of satisfying the needs of his customers as well. The business of retail products is very important because he would like to help defend the social cause of the most destitute people by enabling them to save some money. The lamps will thus be used to light the concessions in his district not supplied with electricity, and the stoves will reduce household energy consumption. In addition, protecting the environment is his passion.

With a family composed of a wife and three children whom he supports, Pascal envisions using the additional income for improving his business and no longer having to turn to borrowing in the future to expand the range of products in his store.

loans.use: to trade in improved stoves, gas stoves, and solar lamps

loans.name: Edwin Antonio

texts.es: Edwin, de 23 años de edad, soltero, habitante de la comarca El Jazmín de oficio agricultor, se dedica a sembrar granos básicos. A la edad de 10 años empezó a trabajar junto con su hermano en las labores del campo pues es de tradición que desde  muy pequeños aprenden a cosechar y llevar el alimento diario y cubrir otras necesidades. Actualmente se dedica a la siembra de frijoles y maíz, también se dedica a la crianza de ganado en menor escala. Durante el verano sale a trabajar a Costa Rica limpiando terrenos y cortando café y de esta manera consigue capital para invertir en sus siembras. El espera obtener una buena producción para vender y obtener una ganancia que le permita  invertir y ampliar su cosecha. Él está requiriendo el crédito para comprar abono, fertilizantes, semillas para sembrar frijoles. Su próxima meta es sembrar 3 manzanas de frijoles y cancelar su crédito.
texts.en: 23 year old Edwin is single and lives in the El Jazmín region. He is a farmer and grows staple grains. He began working in the fields with his brother when he was 10 years old as it is the tradition that children learn to farm from a very early age and put food on the table and cover other necessities.
